description: Defines the 'TicBoard' widget for rendering the game board in a Tic Tac Toe game, including layout and styling.

classes.name: TicBoard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the Tic Tac Toe game board with grid layout, styling, and interactivity.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the TicBoard, including layout, styling, and grid of cells.
